San Francisco, CA. Full time.

Identified (http://www.identified.com/) is hiring engineers. Our web stack is Ruby on Rails with PostgreSQL, but we're looking for anyone who can code regardless of what languages they already know. We'd rather have smart engineers who are capable of learning new tools. We aren't married to any favorite language. Instead, we emphasize using the right tool for the job.

Email: david at identified dot com
